resources.string: It seems it\'s your first time with us. Before we proceed, please take a minute to review the following information:

Analytics and tracking is used across the app to collect data about errors, crashes, events, and performance issues. This data is then sent to us to help improve the app. These reports will never contain any personal data.
Do you want to enable Analytics?
Do you want to check for updates automatically?
Everyone likes their app to behave a certain way. Tell us what you like.\n\nDon\'t worry, you can change any of these later.
Do you prefer English, or Romaji show titles?
Would you like to save everything you watch automatically?

That is all, thanks for your time!
We hope you enjoy the app.

If you experience any issues, or want to provide your valuable feedback to us, you may find our media links at the `More` tab.
We use notifications to tell you about new releases from shows you\'re following, app updates, report results and more. \n\nDon\'t worry, our notifications will never fill your inbox with junk.
Share various collected data with third party ad providers to personalize the ads you see.
We will limit data collection, and we won\'t share your data with third parties.
